  • Help

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractCharacter
This abstract class implements the common methods shared by all the different types of Character.
AnsiColors
Class that contains static string used to print colors in CLI.
App
Main class of the project that is run whenever the jar is started.
Archipelago
Class that models all the islands on the table.
ArchipelagoPane
This class contains most of the game elements, except for those that are specific to players.
AssistantCard
Class that models an assistant.
AssistantContainerPane
This class contains the assistant cards of a user.
Bag
A special type of student container, from which students are drawn throughout the game.
BagContainerPane
This class contains the students bag and the coin heap.
BagPane
This class is for creating the two bags on the board, the students bag and the coin bag (also called coin heap).
BagTest
Tests for the Bag class.
BoardPane
This class represents the player's board.
BoardPiece
Abstract class from which most game elements derive.
BoardPieceWithOwner
Abstract class that extends BoardPiece with added owner (Player) parameter
BoardPieceWithOwnerMutable
Abstract class that extends BoardPieceWithOwner with an added setter method
Character
Interface for the common methods shared by all the different types of Character.
CharacterDetailPane
This class contains a zoomed-in version of the characters with their ability description.
CharacterFactory
As the name suggests, this class creates Characters according to their provided ID.
CharacterManager
Class that stores and manages Characters, directing their activation and giving them the Consumer objects which act as their abilities.
CharacterPane
This class contains a character card: its image, its StudentContainerPane space, its no-entry tile space and its color selection pane space.
CharactersDescription
Enum that represent each character.
CharContainerPane
This class contains the character cards (with their respective information).
CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategy
Interface for the checkAndMoveProfessor strategy.
CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategyC2
Modified CheckAndMoveProfessor strategy set up by Character 2.
CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategyStandard
Standard strategy for the checkAndMoveProfessor method.
CLI
Class to manage the Command Line Interface.
Client
Class that models a client that connects to the server in order to play the game though the use of a UI.
ClientApp
Application used to start a client.
CloudContainerPane
This class contains the cloud panes of the game.
CloudPane
This class represents the cloud inside the cloud container.
CloudTile
Element of the board that serves as a student "buffer".
CloudTileTest
Test for CloudTile.
CoinBag
Class that models a coin bag containing the coins left to be taken by players.
Color
Enum used for the different Student, Professor and Table colors.
ColorSelectionPane
This class serves as a pane with which to select a color out of the available color
Command
Enum that represent each command that the user can take.
CommandString
Class that contains static strings which represent the command that the user must write in the CLI.
ConsumerSet
Class that stores the different Consumer objects used by each Character to model their abilities.
Controller
Class that models the controller of the MVC pattern.
DiningRoom
Class that models the dining room of a player board.
DiningRoomTest
Tests for the DiningRoom class.
DisconnectionError
Error sent by the server to all connected clients whenever a client has disconnected.
Effects
Utility class that stores various pre-built effects (e.g. drop shadows and glows) for the GUI elements.
EndTurnUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to end their turn.
Entrance
Class that models the entrance of a player board.
EntranceTest
Tests for the Entrance class.
Error
Generic error used as a base for the errors that are actually sent.
FullTableException
Exception thrown whenever a student is being added to a table that is already full.
Game
Main class of the GameModel.
GameConfig
Class that contains parameters to configure the game correctly for the given number of players.
GameExpert
Class that extends Game.
GameFactory
Class that implements the factory pattern to create different games.
GameMode
Used to create different game types
GameOverException
Exception that is thrown whenever the game is over because a team has won.
GameSettingsUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to select the game setting.
GUI
This class manages the GUIApplication, which stores and displays the graphical interface, via the GUIController class.
GUIApplication
Class for creating the GUI application and displaying it to the user.
GUIController
Class that offers methods to modify and query the GUI (enabling/disabling, getting and updating).
HelpException
Exception thrown whenever the user is requesting help while playing.
IllegalActionError
Error that is sent by the server whenever a user has made a move that it is not allowed to.
IllegalSelectionError
Error that is sent by the server whenever a user action is taken but its parameters can't be interpreted or used correctly to make said action server side.
Info
Class that models generic information sent by the server to a client.
InputParser
Input parser used by CLI to read user input and choose whether to accept it.
IslandGroup
Model a group of island tiles
IslandTile
Class that models a single island tile which can host mother nature, a tower and contain students.
IslandTilePane
This class models an island tile.
LastRoundException
Exception thrown when the current turn being played will be the last.
LobbyDisconnectUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to disconnect from the lobby in order to login in the match server.
LobbyServer
This class is the first to be created server-side, and it in turn creates a server socket which accepts all incoming connections.
Log
This class is an extension of VBox that works as a log and displays information (such as game updates or expected moves) in the upper right part of the screen.
LoginError
Error sent whenever a login error occurs.
LoginUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to log in with a nickname.
LogoutSuccessfulInfo
Info that is sent whenever a user has successfully logged out.
LogoutUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to log out.
MatchServer
This class models an instance of a server, which is tasked with communicating with the players through the SocketConnection class.
Message
Serializable class that models a generic message sent between server and client.
MotherNature
Class that represents MotherNature pawn in game
MoveMotherNatureStrategy
Interface to define the method to implement a mother nature strategy
MoveMotherNatureStrategyC4
Strategy to move MotherNature when Character C4 is activated.
MoveMotherNatureStrategyStandard
Standard Strategy to move MotherNature when no character is activated.
MoveMotherNatureUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to move mother nature to a new island.
MoveStudentUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to move a student to their dining room or to an island.
NoEntryCharacter
This subclass of AbstractCharacter sets the NoEntryTilesSpace on the islands that receive a NoEntryTile.
NoEntryTilesSpace
Class that models presence of NoEntryTiles on an IslandGroup.
ObservableByClient
Interface that is used by any object that can be observed by the client to draw and play the game.
ObservableGUI
Interface common to all the GUI components that can be observed.
ObserverGUI
Interface that defines all the methods that could be called whenever the GUI receives an input.
PawnContainer<T extends BoardPiece>
Abstract class to model a section of the board which contains students or towers
PawnView
Class that models a generic pawn to be placed in various panes, this includes towers, mother nature, no entry tiles, professors and students.
Phase
Utility enum for managing turns and phases in TurnManager.
Ping
Class that implements runnable.
PingInfo
Server response to a Ping UserAction.
PingUserAction
User action sent automatically to ping the server.
PlaceAndRemoveStudent
Interface common to all containers who place and remove students.
PlayAssistantUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to play an assistant.
Player
Class that models a player with its tower color, player board and wizard (its deck).
PlayerBoard
Class that models the player board along with its entrance, dining room and towerspace.
PlayerBoardTest
Tests for the PlayerBoard class.
PlayerConfig
Class that contains parameters to configure player attributes correctly for the given number of players.
PlayerList
New list used for players.
PlayerPane
This class contains most of the game elements that pertain to a player.
PlayerTest
Tests for the Player class.
Professor
Class which models the five Professors of the game.
ProfessorSet
This class contains the Professors and offers useful methods to retrieve the right professor or change their ownership.
RequestParameter
Enum for the parameters requested by the characters.
ResolveStrategy
Interface for the strategy used to resolve an island
ResolveStrategyC6
The strategy used when resolving an island if C6 was activated
ResolveStrategyC8
The strategy used when resolving an island if C8 was activated
ResolveStrategyC9
The strategy used when resolving an island if C9 was activated
ResolveStrategyStandard
The standard strategy used when resolving an island
Server
Interface for all the server classes in the project.
ServerApp
Application used to start a server.
ServerLoginInfo
Info sent by the LobbyServer to inform the client of the address and port of the MatchServer assigned.
SocketConnection
Class that manages a connection from a client.
StrategyCharacter
This subclass of AbstractCharacter deals with setting strategies inside the GameModel.
Student
Models the Student piece as a BoardPiece.
StudentContainer
Abstract class which extends PawnContainer, using Students specifically
StudentContainerPane
Class that models a generic student container pane.
StudentMoverCharacter
This subclass of AbstractCharacter is a sort of StudentContainer.
StudentView
Class that models generic student to be placed in various panes.
Table
Class that models a single table of a single color that can only host students of said color.
TableTest
Tests for the Table class.
TakeFromCloudUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to take the students from a cloud.
Tower
Models the Student piece as a BoardPiece.
TowerColor
Enum used for the different Tower colors.
TowerColorUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to select a tower color.
TowerContainer
Abstract class which extends PawnContainer, using Towers specifically
TowerSpace
Class that models the tower space holding this player's towers left.
TowerSpaceTest
Tests for the TowerSpace class.
TurnController
 
TurnManager
Class that manages the order in which players play their turn.
TurnManagerTest
Tests for the TurnManager class.
TurnOrderPane
Pane that displayed the current turn, player and player order.
UI
Interface that defines all methods that a UI must implement in order to interact with the Client.
Update
Main class that represent the server's response to a Client UserAction.
UseAbilityUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to use a character ability.
UseCharacterUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to activate a character.
UserAction
Generic user action used as a base for the user actions that are actually taken by the user.
UserActionType
Represents the possible user action that the user can take.
WelcomeScreen
Class used to store ASCII art of the logo.
Wizard
Class that models a deck of assistants of certain wizard type.
WizardTest
Tests for the Wizard class.
WizardType
Enum for the different types of wizard.
WizardUserAction
User action sent when a user wants to choose a wizard.
